page.title: 10ATTITUDES
page.content: The Gate Inn nestles snuggly in the lane at Boyden Gate, a quiet and picturesque village at Marshside. the landlord said that the people around Marshside were nice friendly folk. He had come down from{LONDON}for a quiet life and nicer people.In their spare time he and his friends play cricket and rugby and the children do horse riding. The main{DISADVANTAGES}: there are no shops, street lights , or buses.The roads are passable in all but the worst weather conditions though. Marshside Village is very small so there isn't employment there so that the youngsters have to travel in to the towns to get jobs. This is all due to modern machinery on the farms. There are also{WEEKEND COTTAGES used by{businessmen} to relax in over the weekend or holidays.
